com.cloudcraftgaming.perworldchatplus.chat

Class ChatFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudcraftgaming.perworldchatplus.chat.ChatFormat

  • public class ChatFormat
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Nova Fox on 6/6/2016. Website: www.cloudcraftgaming.com For Project: PerWorldChatPlus. This class is to be used to set the chat message's format and to do other format related tasks.

    • Constructor Summary

      ChatFormat()

    • Method Detail

      • determineMessageFormat

        public static java.lang.String determineMessageFormat(java.lang.String originalFormat,
                                      java.lang.String message,
                                      org.bukkit.entity.Player sender)
        Determines the chat message format. This combines all formatting methods.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to format.
        sender - The sender of the message.
        Returns:
        The chat message's format. Can be used directly in chatEvent#setFormat(format)

      • getDefaultTemplate

        public static java.lang.String getDefaultTemplate()
        Gets the default chat format template from file.
        Returns:
        The default chat format template.

      • getGlobalTemplate

        public static java.lang.String getGlobalTemplate()
        Gets the global chat format template.
        Returns:
        The global chat format template.

      • replacePlayerVariable

        public static java.lang.String replacePlayerVariable(java.lang.String format)
        Replaces the player variable with Bukkit's '%s' identifier. ('%s' is Bukkit's default and recognized pattern, this also allows other plugins to change the message).
        Parameters:
        format - The current format of the message.
        Returns:
        The message's format with the player variable replaced.

      • replaceMessageVariable

        public static java.lang.String replaceMessageVariable(java.lang.String format)
        Replaces the message variable with Bukkit's '%s' identifier. ('%s' is Bukkit's default and recognized pattern, this also allows other plugins to change the message).
        Parameters:
        format - The current format of the message.
        Returns:
        The message's format with the message variable replaced.

      • replaceWorldVariable

        public static java.lang.String replaceWorldVariable(java.lang.String format,
                                    org.bukkit.entity.Player sender)
        Replaces the world variable with the sender's world name or world alias.
        Parameters:
        format - The current format of the message.
        sender - The sender of the message
        Returns:
        The message's format with the world variable replaced.

      • replaceGlobalVariable

        public static java.lang.String replaceGlobalVariable(java.lang.String format)
        Replaces the global variable with the global prefix.
        Parameters:
        format - The current format of the message.
        Returns:
        The message's format with the global variable replaced.
